title: Cindy Crawford shares her supermodel secrets + takes us inside the modeling biz!
itunes:title: Cindy Crawford shares her supermodel secrets + takes us inside the modeling biz!
description:
Today’s guest needs no introduction… it’s Cindy Crawford! Besides being Grace’s dream guest, Cindy is also an absolute expert when it comes to skincare. She talks about growing up in the midwest, an early mean girls experience, and of course: her modeling career. She also let us peek behind the curtain and learn how she started her own skincare line, all the way down to the chemistry! She also tells us her favorite fashion trends, products… even her work out routine. She also lets us in on a few model secrets (her swap for soy sauce, her cocktail of choice). Cindy talks about balance, self care, and motherhood. We found Cindy’s life fascinating and didn’t think this was possible but somehow love her even more than before! 

Products mentioned

  • Meaningful beauty - Cindy’s beauty line (also available at Ulta)
    • Intensive Triple Exfoliating Treatment
    • Anti-Aging Day Cream
    • Age Recovery Night Cream
    • Youth Activating Melon Serum
    • Firming & Tightening Body Hydration Treatment
    • Lifting Eye Cream
    • Revive & Brighten Eye Masque
  • Amazon Ice Roller 
  • Veronica Beard Blazers
  • Sarah Flint Perfect Pumps
  • Sarah Flint Flats
  • Sarah Flint Marina Boot
  • Cindy’s fave jeans: Redone, Frame, AG, Page, Citizens of Humanity, Midheaven
  • Nicola Bathie Earrings

Books:

  • A Little Life by Hana Yanagihara
  • Educated by Tara Westover
  • Maybe You Should Talk to Someone by Lori Gottlieb
  • I’ll Never Tell by Catherine Mackenzie
  • The Flatshare by Beth O’Leary
  • The Gifted School by Bruce Holsinger
  • How Could She by Lauren Mechling (October Book Club!)

TV Shows:

  • Euphoria on HBO
  • Modern Love on Amazon
  • Succession on NetFlix

Instagram Obsession:

  • @swissmiss
  • @verryrobin_co

 Sponsors:

  • Sarah Flint: Take $45 off your first pair with code BOP45 at sarahflint.com
  • Equilibria: Go to Equilibriawomen.com and enter code BOP at check out for 15% off your first order (the beginner box is not included)
  • Modern Fertility: Get $20 off your first kit at modernfertility.com/BOP 

Instagram Obsession:

@swissmiss

@verryrobin_co

Check out tickets to our Fall live shows in Atlanta, New York City and Dallas.

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more!

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast. Follow Grace on Instagram @graceatwood and Becca @beccamfreeman.
